steps.title: Add Your Projects
steps.description: Easily manage your projects with our intuitive Notion dashboard. Add tasks, leave comments, or even let us handle task management for you.

steps.title: Weekly Consultations
steps.description: To take it further, we offer (optional) 45-minute weekly consultations. The perfect opportunity to brainstorm, overcome obstacles, and continuously optimize your projects.
